node.statement: (DER-HS-corrected) The corrected DER-HS uses TWO integrals from the two-term Frenkel representation (FR-bip): d/dt D(rho(t)||tau(t)) = integral_{1/d_A}^{M_fwd(t)} Tr[P_beta(t) delta_AB^{(beta)}]/beta dbeta + integral_{d_A}^{M_rev(t)} Tr[Q_beta(t) (1_A tensor delta_B - beta delta_AB)]/beta^2 dbeta. Forward term: differentiate E_beta(rho||tau)/beta under integral (node 1.5). Reverse term: differentiate E_beta(tau||rho)/beta^2 under integral (node 1.8). Both integrals over compact domains (bounded by d_A and M_rev). Supersedes the incorrect single-integral formula in node 1.6's original statement.
